friendly_name: URLs and titles of parts of 'guide' and 'travel_advice' documents
description: URLs, base_paths, slugs, indexes and titles of parts of 'guide' and 'travel_advice' documents

schema.name: base_path
schema.description: URL of the parent document of the part

schema.name: slug
schema.description: What to add to the base_path to get the url

schema.name: part_index
schema.description: The order of the part among other parts in the same document, counting from 0
